ComicInfo.Summary:
Sela and Baba Yaga are forced to put aside their differences and join forces against Koschei the Deathless. Will their combined power be enough to defeat this minion of the Dark Queen, or will both fall to an evil that feeds off of their attacks? The Age of Darkness approaches as the countdown to Grimm Fairy Tales #100 continues!
